\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7b15fd4da637b7f997c7098a7b91177a]%mdk
$\bm{n}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={69}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[069e4a92dd4a552620cea2e8d26e44ea]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={71}
\Delta^n = \qty{(t_0, t_1, \dots, t_n) \in \R^{n+1} :
  t_i \ge 0\ \forall i \text{ and } \sum_{i=0}^n t_i = 1}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\partial(\sigma_\alpha) = \sum_{i=0}^n (-1)^i
